meanings.definition: One quadrillionth in a series or sequence.
meanings.sent1: In the race, he finished in the quadrillionth position.
meanings.sent2: The quadrillionth star in the sky sparkled brightly.
meanings.sent3: The quadrillionth cookie in the jar always seemed to be the tastiest.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as soft as a quadrillionth snowflake falling.
meanings.sent5: The quadrillionth drop of rain landed gently on the window.

meanings.definition: A fraction where the denominator is one quadrillion.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a quadrillionth of a teaspoon of salt.
meanings.sent2: She had only a quadrillionth of the total amount needed for the project.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he would only give a quadrillionth of his dessert to his friend.
meanings.sent4: The chances of winning were as slim as a quadrillionth of a hair.
meanings.sent5: The quadrillionth piece of the puzzle finally fit perfectly.
